Hi, what's the source on these? HDTV? Bluray? Re-encodes? Cheers.
Volume 1 has no watermarks, so I think that's blu-ray rips. The rest are HDTV. I hope you enjoy it!
Okay, thanks! Good to know :)

Never seen this before, I wish though that I hadn't seen the "pilot" episode (00) as some of the stuff it contains is rewritten in the real episodes. Can be a tad confusing and gives away story twists too early, and it doesn't appear that much of the added runtime is actually extra footage, as much of it is reused later in the next episodes.

I would advise any one to not watch the 00 episode until maybe after finishing the whole deal.

@KickassWashingMachine
Thanks for the heads up, i totally forgot to say that! But then again, it says episode 0, which basically always means it's an alternative first episode... :P
Thanks. Will seed

This is a great torrent, but for the fact that only one person is involved with the seeding and it seems that even that person drops the ball from time to time. It'd be great if that were to change, if more of you could keep seeding when finished. After all, one man can only do so much.

Thanks a lot m8. Great upload indeed. 
And to everybody who is getting bad speed: 
1. Have you opened your port?
2. Have you configured you client properly? 
3. Have you enough bandwidth? 
I find that I get good speed on most public torrents with my 2.5Mbit upload speed. But you'll need a seedbox to really get very high speeds here. Try downloading with 100Mbit up and downstream.... :)
There is no subtitle on this one, just so you people should know.
